title: The Kat Tat Interview: Tattooing, Black Ink Compton, Motherhood & More
description:
Kat talks about her come up, hard work, following her dreams, working at her craft, making things happen for herself, reopening her store in Beverly Hills, and much more! ----- 00:00 Intro 10:08 Started on melanated skin so it was easier to learn this specifically 16:00 Would she tatt "k*ller" on someone's face? 16:40 R Kelly p**ing on a fire hydrant tattoo 19:51 Working at a couple of shops with all the poppin artists in Chicago, TV noticed them, it was like a dream 23:10 The show was organic, they forgot the camera were there 24:37 Her dream of opening her own shop in LA 26:31 Kat almost got a spin-off but it didn't pan out, she is only now getting back to TV (Black Ink Compton called her) 27:23 Kat's first experience didn't work out because she got the wrong business model, so she started again until it made sense + Opening her new shop in Beverly Hills 29:31 Kat made a point to get fire elite, Black tattoo artists for her shop 30:18 Kat and her team dealt with blatant racism at first, called the n word when they pulled up to work 35:19 Adam and AD covered up ex-girlfriend's names 36:25 From covid couple to having 2 kids 38:20 Tattoo artists playing the clout game with rappers + Rappers expect free work 43:58 Always strive to elevate yourself and work on your craft 45:24 Adam's tattoo guy slept with his girl soon as they broke up + Tattoo artists slanging d*cks round the clock 47:03 Focusing on remodeling her shop to reopen very soon in Beverly Hills ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps!
